title: Lead research / data base
snippet:
Goal: Identification of key marketing contacts and marketing decision makers within the 100 companies (in Hong Kong) that we will provide you, and collection of data. 

Deliverables: 

1. A complete data base including: 

•	Key marketing contacts among each company on the list: 
o	Marketing director
o	CMO
o	Marketing manager
o	Brand or Product Manager
o	Marketing executive

•	The following information: 
o	Name
o	Position
o	Email address
o	Telephone number
o	Mailing address
o	LinkedIn profile

2. Complete the list with more companies and their key contacts including: 
•	Top 20 start-ups / accelerator programs in Hong Kong (they might not have marketing contacts, in that case, search CEO and COO). 
•	Top 10 NGOs in Hong Kong
•	All the brands associated to the company groups on the list.

Deadline: project to be completed within 3 weeks. 

Please kindly send us a quote and don’t hesitate to share your creds, projects you’ve done before.
